page.title: 18SECONDARY SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: I go to Beaumont Leys School.There are 1200 pupils at my school aged from 11 to 19,so it is quite abig school and when I started it was easy to get lost.There are 70 teachers plus librarians,secretaries,dinner staff and technicians.In years 1 to 3 we study we all the same subjects.My favourites are Drama,Dance,and Science.In the fourth year we choose from a whole range of subjects,some of which,like Business Studies and Computing,have not been available before.In years 4 and 5 we also go on Community Service and Work Experience. In our large Sixth Form pupils can take "A"level examinations or follow a vocational course such as Childcare. There are after-school activities like sports matches,theatre visits,Music and Drama clubs and Computing club(my favourite!).
